channel.title: Tutoring – Underdog Solutions
channel.description: Bespoke IT and AV solutions for companies and private individuals.

item.title: Beginners IT tuition (1 hour session)
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.description:
Are you scared of hitting the wrong button?  Just starting out in the world of IT?  It’s never too late to start! If you need help getting to grips with anything IT I can shadow your session remotely (view your screen from a far). I can then assist you and show you how to use…
Read more
item.content:encoded:
Are you scared of hitting the wrong button?  Just starting out in the world of IT?  It’s never too late to start!

If you need help getting to grips with anything IT I can shadow your session remotely (view your screen from a far).

I can then assist you and show you how to use various software and navigate around the OS of your choice, be that Apple Mac, Apple iOS on phones/ tablets, Windows (any version) or even Linux.  It may be that you now have the time and money to invest in learning, IT can be a fun creative and rewarding hobby!

item.title: Intermediate IT tutoring (1 hour session)
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.description: If you need help getting to grips with anything IT I can shadow your session remotely (view your screen from a far), I can then assist you and show you what could be improved. It may be Website creation, or just general getting to grips Microsoft Office or a new OS.
item.content:encoded: If you need help getting to grips with anything IT I can shadow your session remotely (view your screen from a far), I can then assist you and show you what could be improved.  It may be Website creation, or just general getting to grips Microsoft Office or a new OS.

item.title: Advanced IT tutoring (1 hour session)
item.dc:creator: 1AdminOne@UnderdogSolutions
item.description: If you need help with anything IT I can shadow your session remotely (view your screen from a far), I can then assist you and show you what could be improved. It may be Website creation, programming or other software related issues. Let me know what you need to improve on.
item.content:encoded: If you need help with anything IT I can shadow your session remotely (view your screen from a far), I can then assist you and show you what could be improved.  It may be Website creation, programming or other software related issues.  Let me know what you need to improve on.
